name: create-ada
description: Professional frontend boilerplate with CLI generator

scripts.test: bun run --cwd cli dev test-app --preset standard --yes && cd cli/test-app && bun install && bun typecheck && cd .. && rm -rf test-app
scripts.preview:minimal: rm -rf preview && bun cli/src/index.ts preview --preset minimal -y && cd preview && bun install
scripts.preview:standard: rm -rf preview && bun cli/src/index.ts preview --preset standard -y && cd preview && bun install
scripts.preview:enterprise: rm -rf preview && bun cli/src/index.ts preview --preset enterprise -y && cd preview && bun install
